description: Returns information, including performance data and capacity usage, which DataSync Discovery collects about a specific resource in your-premises storage system.

parameters.name: DiscoveryJobArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the discovery job that collects information about your on-premises storage system.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Specifies the kind of storage system resource that you want information about.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: Specifies the universally unique identifier (UUID) of the storage system resource that you want information about.

nested_items.name: Metrics
nested_items.description: The details that your discovery job collected about your storage system resource.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: The time when DataSync Discovery collected this information from the resource.

nested_items.name: P95Metrics
nested_items.description: The types of performance data that DataSync Discovery collects about the on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: Read
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to read operations.

nested_items.name: Write
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS related to write operations.

nested_items.name: Other
nested_items.description: Peak IOPS unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: Total
nested_items.description: Peak total IOPS on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: Throughput
nested_items.description: The throughput peaks for an on-premises storage system resource. Each data point represents the 95th percentile peak value during a 1-hour interval.

nested_items.name: Read
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to read operations.

nested_items.name: Write
nested_items.description: Peak throughput related to write operations.

nested_items.name: Other
nested_items.description: Peak throughput unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: Total
nested_items.description: Peak total throughput on your on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: Read
nested_items.description: Peak latency for read operations.

nested_items.name: Write
nested_items.description: Peak latency for write operations.

nested_items.name: Other
nested_items.description: Peak latency for operations unrelated to read and write operations.

nested_items.name: Used
nested_items.description: The amount of space that's being used in a storage system resource.

nested_items.name: Provisioned
nested_items.description: The total amount of space available in a storage system resource.

nested_items.name: LogicalUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of space that's being used in a storage system resource without accounting for compression or deduplication.

nested_items.name: ClusterCloudStorageUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of space in the cluster that's in cloud storage (for example, if you're using data tiering).

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of on-premises storage system resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The opaque string that indicates the position to begin the next list of results in the response.
